== Kuttikkattoor (CT) (627431) ==

Kuttikkattoor (CT) is a town in the [[Kozhikode]] taluka of [[Kozhikode]] district with an area of 10.62 sq. km. and harbouring 5843 households with total population of 25929 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kozhikode]] is at a distance of 10 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 400 km. Male population is 12724 and female population is 13205. Scheduled Caste population is 1585 and Scheduled Tribes population is 21. Census Location Code of the town is 627431<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 10 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 10 km. Railway station is at Kozhikode at a distance of 10 km.
